experiences.description:
• Leveraged Python computer vision and deep learning modules to extract information from piping and instrumentation diaqrams (P&IDs) as part of a team of three interns. 
• Provided a P&ID UI feature for the gas turbine human-machine interface using JavaScript, HTML andcss.

• Implemented thermodynamic equilibrium calculations in MATLAB for predicting ternary phase diagrams of salt hydrate systems. 
• Investigated methods for synthesizing novel salt hydrate materials.
experiences.title: EngineeringMaterialsIntern

experiences.description:
• Saved 78 engineering hours and $8,500 per turbine project by developing a Python & Java program that automatically determines optimal gas detector placements in turbine packages 
• Implemented the automation program using CFD data, CAD and optimization algorithms Conducted training on how to use the program to CFD engineers within the department.
experiences.title: Engineering Assistant

experiences.description: • Developed Python and Bash programs to automatically calculate energies of perovskite materials withDFT.
experiences.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
